direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve converting between jsoup and W3C DOM structures, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods process W3C Document objects, though one performs XPath evaluation and the other serializes the document to a string.
Both methods work with NodeList objects, though one evaluates XPath expressions and the other retrieves original jsoup nodes from the NodeList.
Both methods handle null parameters and throw exceptions in a similar manner.
Both methods access and manipulate the same W3C Document resources, with similar parameter handling and return types.
